scripts.install:all: npm --prefix apps/backend ci && npm --prefix apps/frontend ci
scripts.test:backend: cd apps/backend && npm ci && npx prisma generate && npm run test
scripts.test:frontend: cd apps/frontend && npm ci && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd apps/backend && npm ci && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd apps/frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.pipeline:local: npm run install:all && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.pipeline:full-local: npm run install:all && npm run test && npm run build && npm run docker:up
